key_risks: Intense competition from global real estate firms
Workforce retention and talent acquisition difficulties
Litigation and dispute risks from DALS practice
controversies: Potential legal liabilities from expert testimony and valuation disputes
Regulatory scrutiny around sustainability and data privacy compliance
environmental_issues: Costs associated with reducing carbon emissions and green building practices
social_issues: Challenges in attracting and retaining skilled professionals
Adapting to post-pandemic workplace evolution and hybrid work models
governance_issues: Managing compliance with varying jurisdictional regulations
Balancing profitability with sustainability and technology investments
